pkgmetadata.longdescription: Microsoft Azure CLI 'KUSTO' Command Module==========================================Provides management capabilities for Kusto (Azure Data Explorer) clusters... :changelog:Release History===============0.2.3+++++Minor fixes.0.2.2+++++Minor fixes.0.2.1+++++* kusto dependency bug fix0.2.0+++++* Changed hot_cache_period and soft_delete_period types for database to ISO8601 duration format.0.1.0+++++* Preview release.
